<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_one_extend_builder_capability</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>OneExtendBuilderCapabilityInsert</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
var setup_script = current.builder.setup_script.api_name;
if (setup_script !== "") { var payload = {}; payload["builder"] = current.builder.name.getDisplayValue(); payload["capabilityId"] = current.definition.getValue("capability"); payload["capabilityName"] = current.definition.capability.name.getDisplayValue(); payload["definitionId"] = current.definition.getRefRecord().getUniqueValue();
var attributes = sn_one_extend.OneExtendUtil.getDefinitionAttributes(payload["definitionId"]); payload["attributes"] = attributes; var script = "new " + setup_script + "().setup(" + JSON.stringify(payload) + ");";
try { eval(script); } catch (e) { gs.error("error in calling setup script", e); } }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-12 19:52:53</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1f11981353711110c271ddeeff7b12cd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>OneExtendBuilderCapabilityInsert</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Glide OneExtend" source="com.glide.one_extend">dc98175b47220210cd4e1ce4316d4324</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1f11981353711110c271ddeeff7b12cd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-11-20 02:09:09</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>async_always</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1f11981353711110c271ddeeff7b12cd"/> </record_update>
